p: Based on the UHPLC-ESI-MS data reported by Martina Cirlini et al. [ 368], the methanolic extract of Mentha spicata contains 88% of rosmarinic acid derivatives when calculating the amount of rosmarinic acid derivatives as percentage of the total amount of detected phenols. For the salvianolic acids, a percentage of 5.6% of the total amount of detected phenols was calculated.
